footer.description:
Bull Diary is your professional trading companion, designed to help traders analyze their performance, track portfolio growth, and compete in exciting tournaments.

Connect your exchange accounts, save your best trades to bookmarks, and join our growing community of traders striving for excellence in the cryptocurrency markets.

closed_title.already_joined: You have already joined this tournament!

label.name: Name
label.subject: Subject
label.agreement_key: I confirm that I use 'read-only' keys

risk.title: Important risk notice
risk.content:
Trading financial instruments is associated with a high risk of loss of funds.

Our service provides only analytical tools and is not an investment advice. All trading decisions are made by the user at their own risk.

termini.title: 1. Terms and definitions
termini.content:
In this User Agreement, the following terms are used:

Bull Diary — web platform for analyzing trading operations, providing users with the ability to store, analyze trading history, and participate in tournaments.

Company/Administration — owner and operator of the "Bull Diary" service.

User — physical or legal person who has passed the registration procedure in the service.

Materials/Content — any information, messages, data, posted on the platform, including text materials, images, audio-visual works, graphics, design, trademarks.

API keys — access keys to trading platforms, used exclusively for reading data.

part_1.title: 2.1. Subject of the agreement
part_1.content: The present agreement regulates the relationship between the Company and the User when using the "Bull Diary" service.

part_2.title: 2.2. Acceptance of conditions
part_2.content:
By using the "Bull Diary" service, you confirm that:
  • You have read and understood all the terms of this agreement
  • You agree to comply with all provisions of the agreement
  • You have the right to enter into this agreement

part_3.title: 2.3. Changes in conditions
part_3.content:
The Company reserves the right to change the terms of this agreement. Users will be notified of significant changes:
  • By email at least 30 days before the changes take effect
  • Through notifications in the personal account
  • On the main page of the service

part_1.title: 3.1. Functionality
part_1.content:
The "Bull Diary" service provides the following opportunities:
  • Connection of trading accounts through API exchanges (Bybit, planned OKX, MEXC)
  • Analysis of trading operations with detailed statistics
  • Trading diary with the ability to add notes
  • Tournaments for competitions between traders
  • Analytical reports and data visualization
  • Bookmark system for saving important deals
  • Real-time monitoring of positions and PnL

part_2.title: 3.2. Limitations
part_2.content:
The service is provided "as is" and does not guarantee:
  • Continuous operation without technical interruptions
  • Absolute accuracy of data from external APIs
  • Data preservation in case of force majeure

part_1.title: 4.1. Security of API keys
part_1.content:
CRITICALLY IMPORTANT: We use only read-only API keys.When connecting a trading account, the User undertakes to:
  • Use ONLY API keys with "read-only" permissions
  • NEVER provide keys with trading permissions
  • Revoke access at any time through the exchange settings
  • Immediately report any key compromise

part_2.title: 4.2. Encryption of data
part_2.content:
• API keys are encrypted using AES-256
  • Each user has a unique encryption key
  • Data is stored in accordance with the requirements of the RF Law "On Personal Data"

part_3.title: 4.3. Responsibility for keys
part_3.content:
• The User is fully responsible for:
  • The security of their API keys
  • The consequences of their improper use
  • Losses incurred due to key compromise

part_1.title: 5.1. Obligations of the Company
part_1.content:
The Company undertakes to:
  • Provide access to the service in accordance with the terms of the agreement
  • Ensure the security of personal data of users
  • Notify about technical work and changes in the service
  • Provide technical support within reasonable limits

part_2.title: 5.2. Rights of the Company
part_2.content:
The Company has the right:
  • Change the functionality of the service
  • Suspend work for technical work
  • Block accounts in case of violation of conditions
  • Send information messages to users

part_3.title: 5.3. Obligations of the User
part_3.content:
The User undertakes to:
  • Provide accurate information when registering
  • Not transfer access to the account to third parties
  • Use the service only in lawful purposes
  • Not attempt to obtain unauthorized access to the system
  • Comply with the laws of the Russian Federation

part_4.title: 5.4. Rights of the User
part_4.content:
The User has the right:
  • Receive access to the service in accordance with the conditions
  • Refuse to receive advertising messages
  • Demand the deletion of personal data
  • Terminate the agreement at any time

part_1.title: 6.1. Disclaimer
part_1.content:
IMPORTANT: Our service does not provide investment advice. All analytical data is for informational purposes only.

The Company is not responsible for:
  • Users' trading decisions
  • Losses from trading operations
  • Quality and stability of internet connection
  • Operation of external exchange APIs
  • Consequences of force majeure circumstances

part_2.title: 6.2. Limitation of liability
part_2.content: The Company's total liability is limited to the amount paid by the User for using the service during the last 12 months.

part_1.title: 7.1. Company rights
part_1.content:
All service materials, including:
  • Design and user interface
  • Source code and software
  • Logos and trademarks
  • Documentation and training materials

are the property of the Company and protected by copyright.

part_2.title: 7.2. Use of materials
part_2.content:
The User DOES NOT have the right to:
  • Copy, reproduce or distribute service materials
  • Create derivative works
  • Use trademarks and logos without permission

part_1.title: 8.1. Consent to processing
part_1.content:
By registering in the service, the User consents to the processing of personal data in accordance with:
  • Federal Law No. 152-FZ "On Personal Data"
  • Service privacy policy

part_2.title: 8.2. Processing purposes
part_2.content:
Personal data is processed for:
  • Providing service functionality
  • User identification
  • Communication with the user
  • Improving service quality

part_3.title: 8.3. Rights of personal data subjects
part_3.content:
The User has the right to:
  • Receive information about the processing of their data
  • Request correction of inaccurate data
  • Request data deletion
  • Withdraw consent to processing

part_1.title: 9.1. Agreement conclusion
part_1.content: The agreement is considered concluded from the moment of User registration in the service.

part_2.title: 9.2. Agreement termination
part_2.content:
The agreement may be terminated:

At the User's initiative:
  • At any time through account settings
  • By sending an application to email: bull-diary.com
At the Company's initiative:
  • In case of violation of terms of use
  • In case of suspected fraud
  • When closing the service (with 90 days notice)

part_3.title: 9.3. Consequences of termination
part_3.content:
Upon termination of the agreement:
  • Access to the service is terminated
  • Personal data is deleted within 30 days
  • No refund is made

part_1.title: 10.1. Pre-trial procedure
part_1.content: All disputes are resolved through pre-trial negotiations.

part_2.title: 10.2. Court procedure
part_2.content: If pre-trial settlement is impossible, disputes are considered in court at the Company's location in accordance with the legislation of the Russian Federation.

part_1.title: 11.1. Force majeure circumstances
part_1.content:
The parties are released from liability for non-performance of obligations in case of force majeure circumstances, including:
  • Natural disasters
  • Military actions
  • Technical failures of providers
  • Actions of government bodies

part_2.title: 11.2. Force majeure notification
part_2.content: The party for which force majeure circumstances have occurred is obliged to notify the other party within 24 hours.

part_1.title: 12.1. Applicable law
part_1.content: This agreement is governed by the legislation of the Russian Federation.

part_2.title: 12.2. Validity of provisions
part_2.content: If any provision of the agreement is declared invalid, the remaining provisions remain in force.

part_3.title: 12.3. Language of the agreement
part_3.content: The agreement is drawn up in Russian. In case of contradictions between versions in different languages, the Russian version takes priority.

part_1.title: For all questions related to this agreement:
part_1.content:
• Email: bull-diary.com
  • Response time: within 5 business days
  • Technical support: support@bull-diary.com

part_2.title: Mailing address:
part_2.content:
123456,
Moscow, Trader Street, 1

public_offer.content: This agreement is a public offer in accordance with Article 437 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation.

gdpr.title: GDPR, CCPA and FZ-152 compliance
gdpr.content:
We comply with the requirements:
  • GDPR (European Union) - Regulation (EU) 2016/679
  • CCPA (California) - California Consumer Privacy Act
  • FZ-152 (Russia) - "On Personal Data"

Your privacy rights are protected in accordance with international and Russian standards.

part_1.title: 1.1. Purpose of the policy
part_1.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when using the "Bull Diary" service.

part_2.title: 1.2. Legal basis
part_2.content:
The policy is developed in accordance with:
  • Federal Law No. 152-FZ "On Personal Data" of July 27, 2006
  • Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR)
  • California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
  • Other applicable personal data protection laws

part_3.title: 1.3. Applicability
part_3.content: The policy applies to all users of the "Bull Diary" service, regardless of their location.

part_1.title: 2.1. Key terms
part_1.content:
Personal data - any information related to a directly or indirectly identifiable or identifiable physical person (subject of personal data).

Processing of personal data - any action (operation) or a set of actions (operations) with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, refinement, extraction, use, transfer, anonymization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data.

Automated processing - processing of personal data using computer means.

Blocking of personal data - temporary cessation of processing of personal data.

Automated processing - processing of personal data using computer means.

Destruction of personal data - actions, the result of which makes it impossible to restore the content of personal data.

Subject of personal data - physical person to whom personal data relate.

Operator - Company, determining the purposes and content of processing of personal data.

part_1.title: 3.1. Required information
part_1.content:
When registering and using the service, we collect:

Identifying data:
  • Name and surname
  • Email address
  • Password (encrypted)
  • Phone number (optional)
Profile data:
  • Account settings
  • Interface preferences
  • Language settings
  • Timezone

part_2.title: 3.2. Trading data
part_2.content:
Trading data:
  • Trade history (only through read-only API)
  • Open positions
  • Balances of trading accounts
  • Portfolio statistics
  • Analytical metrics (PnL, ROI, Sharpe ratio)
API keys and credentials:
  • API keys of exchanges (encrypted)
  • Connection settings to exchanges
  • Authentication tokens

part_3.title: 3.3. Automatically collected data
part_3.content:
Technical data:
  • IP address and geolocation
  • Browser and device data
  • Operating system
  • Time and duration of sessions
Usage data:
  • Access logs to the service
  • Function usage statistics
  • Errors and crashes
  • Performance data

part_4.title: 3.4. Cookies and similar technologies
part_4.content:
Types of cookies:
  • Essential - for authentication and session work
  • Functional - for saving user settings
  • Analytical - for improving the service (can be disabled)
  • Marketing - for showing relevant advertising

part_1.title: 4.1. Basic purposes
part_1.content:
Providing services:
  • Providing access to the "Bull Diary" service
  • Synchronization of data with trading exchanges
  • Generation of analytical reports
  • Technical support for users
Security:
  • Authentication and authorization of users
  • Protection from fraud and abuse
  • Monitoring suspicious activity
  • Compliance with legal requirements

part_2.title: 4.2. Additional purposes
part_2.content:
Improving the service:
  • Analysis of function usage
  • Development of new features
  • Optimization of performance
  • Personalization of the user experience
Communication:
  • Notifications about important changes
  • Information about new features
  • Marketing messages (with consent)
  • Technical notifications

part_1.title: 5.1. Consent of the data subject
part_1.content:
Processing of personal data is carried out on the basis of:
  • Explicit consent of the user at registration
  • Consent to process cookies
  • Consent to marketing communications

part_2.title: 5.2. Execution of the contract
part_2.content:
Processing of data necessary for:
  • Providing services in accordance with the user agreement
  • Fulfilling obligations to the user
  • Ensuring service functionality

part_3.title: 5.3. Legal interests
part_3.content:
Processing of data necessary for:
  • Ensuring service security
  • Preventing fraud
  • Improving service quality
  • Compliance with legal requirements

part_1.title: 6.1. Technical protection
part_1.content:
Encryption:
  • SSL/TLS for data transmission
  • AES-256 for storing sensitive data
  • Unique encryption keys for each user
  • HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
Authentication and Authorization:
  • Two-factor authentication (2FA)
  • JWT tokens with limited validity
  • OAuth integration (Google, GitHub)
  • Role and permission system
Infrastructure Security:
  • Regular security updates
  • Monitoring of suspicious activity
  • Automatic data backups
  • Incident response plan

part_2.title: 6.2. Organizational protection
part_2.content:
Data access:
  • Principle of least privilege
  • Limited number of employees with access
  • Regular access audits
  • Employee training on data protection
Security procedures:
  • Data handling policies
  • Data breach response procedures
  • Regular penetration testing
  • Compliance with security standards

part_1.title: 7.1. Principles of transfer
part_1.content:
We DO NOT SELL and DO NOT TRANSFER your personal data:
  • To advertising companies
  • To data brokers
  • To marketing agencies
  • To other traders or users

part_2.title: 7.2. Exceptions (only in case of legal basis)
part_2.content:
Trading exchanges:
  • For obtaining trading data through read-only API
  • Strictly within the scope of providing services
  • Without transferring personal data
Cloud providers:
  • With data protection agreements (DPA)
  • With compliance with security standards
  • With limited access to data
Law enforcement agencies:
  • In case of a court decision
  • Within the scope of investigating crimes
  • With notification to the user (if possible)

part_3.title: 7.3. International transfers
part_3.content:
When transferring data beyond Russia/EU we ensure:
  • Use standard contractual clauses (SCC)
  • Provide an adequate level of protection
  • Obtain user consent if necessary

part_1.title: 8.1. Right to information
part_1.content:
You have the right to obtain information about:
  • What personal data we process
  • Purposes and methods of processing
  • Storage period
  • Third parties to whom data is transferred

part_2.title: 8.2. Right to access
part_2.content:
Request for a copy of data:
  • Request for a copy of all your personal data
  • Information about the sources of obtaining data
  • Information about the purposes of processing
  • Data about third parties who have access

part_3.title: 8.3. Right to correction
part_3.content:
Updating data:
  • Correction of inaccurate data
  • Completion of incomplete data
  • Updating outdated information
  • Notification of third parties about changes

part_4.title: 8.4. Right to deletion ("right to be forgotten")
part_4.content:
Deletion of data when:
  • Withdrawal of consent to processing
  • Illegal processing of data
  • Achieving the purposes of processing
  • Violation of legal requirements

part_5.title: 8.5. Right to restriction of processing
part_5.content:
Temporary restriction when:
  • Dispute about the accuracy of data
  • Illegal processing of data
  • Need to preserve for legal purposes
  • Objection to processing

part_6.title: 8.6. Right to portability
part_6.content:
Export of data:
  • Receiving data in a structured format
  • Machine-readable format (JSON, CSV)
  • Direct transfer to another operator
  • Only data provided by the user

part_7.title: 8.7. Right to objection
part_7.content:
Refusal to process:
  • Against processing for marketing purposes
  • Against automated decision-making
  • Against processing in legal interests
  • Unconditional right to withdraw consent

part_1.title: 9.1. Account data
part_1.content:
• Before account deletion by the user
  • 30 days after deletion (for possible restoration)
  • 7 years for data related to financial operations

part_2.title: 9.2. Trading data
part_2.content:
• 7 years — requirements of legislation on financial operations
  • 3 years — for analytical purposes
  • 1 year — for performance data

part_3.title: 9.3. Technical data
part_3.content:
• Access logs — 1 year
  • Cookies — according to browser settings
  • API keys — until withdrawal by the user
  • Backup copies — 30 days

part_1.title: 10.1. Types of cookies used
part_1.content:
Strictly necessary:
  • Authentication of users
  • Session security
  • Protection from CSRF attacks
  • Basic service functionality
Functional:
  • Saving user settings
  • Language preferences
  • Theme settings
  • Personalization of the interface
Analytical:
  • Usage statistics
  • Service performance
  • Errors and crashes
  • Improvement of the user experience
Marketing:
  • Showing relevant advertising
  • Measuring campaign effectiveness
  • Personalization of advertising
  • Tracking conversions

part_2.title: 10.2. Management of cookies
part_2.content:
Browser settings:
  • Blocking all  cookies
  • Blocking third-party cookies
  • Notifications about cookies
  • Deletion of existing cookies
Service settings:
  • Cookie management panel
  • Selective disabling of types
  • Detailed information about each cookie
  • Simple management of preferences

part_1.title: 11.1. Age restrictions
part_1.content:
• The service is intended for persons over 18 years old.
  • We do not collect personal data of minors.
  • Immediate deletion if minors data is discovered

part_1.title: 12.1. Profiling
part_1.content:
We can use automated processing for:
  • Analysis of trading patterns
  • Recommendations for settings
  • Detection of suspicious activity
  • Personalization of the interface

part_2.title: 12.2. Your rights
part_2.content:
• Information about the logic of decision-making
  • Objection to automated processing
  • Request for human intervention
  • Explanation of the decisions made

part_1.title: 13.1. Notifications about changes
part_1.content:
We will notify you about significant changes:
  • By email at least 30 days before the changes take effect
  • Through notifications in the personal account
  • On the main page of the service

part_2.title: 13.2. Consent to changes
part_2.content:
• Continuing to use the service after changes means your consent to the new version of the policy.
  • Ability to withdraw consent and delete the account
  • Preservation of previous versions of the policy
  • Ability to compare changes with previous versions

part_1.title: 14.1. For privacy questions
part_1.content:
• Email: bull-diary.com
  • Response time: within 5 working days
  • Technical support: support@bull-diary.com

part_2.title: Mailing address:
part_2.content:
123456,
Moscow, Trader Street, 1

part_1.title: 15.1. Applicable law
part_1.content:
This policy is regulated by:
  • Federal Law No. 152-ФЗ "On Personal Data" from 27.07.2006
  • Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR)
  • California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
  • Other applicable laws on the protection of personal data

part_2.title: 15.2. Language of the policy
part_2.content: The policy is written in Russian. In case of contradictions between versions in different languages, the Russian version takes precedence.

part_3.title: 15.3. Validity of provisions
part_3.content: If any provision of the policy is deemed invalid, the remaining provisions remain in force.

agreement_part.content: This privacy policy is an integral part of the "Bull Diary" service user agreement.

not_found.title: Page not found
not_found.description: It looks like you tried to access a page that doesn't exist.

intro.title: Master Your Trading Journey
intro.description:
Transform your trading experience with Bull Diary — the ultimate platform for professional traders.

Analyze your performance, track your progress, and compete with the best in exciting tournaments.
Join thousands of traders who have already elevated their skills and achieved consistent results.

manual.title: Get Started in 5 Simple Steps
manual.subtitle:
Designed by professional traders for traders of all levels — from beginners to advanced professionals.
Follow these steps to unlock your full trading potential.

step_1.title: Create Your Account
step_1.subtitle:
Sign up for Bull Diary and connect your exchange API keys securely.

Support for multiple exchanges and accounts — manage everything in one place. Your API keys are encrypted and stored safely with read-only permissions for maximum security.

step_2.title: Sync Data
step_2.subtitle: Our platform automatically imports your trading history from the last 180 days . Real-time synchronization keeps your data always up to date.

step_3.title: Trade
step_3.subtitle: Use your preferred trading strategy, signals, or analysis to make informed decisions. Open and close positions on your connected exchanges.

step_4.title: Record
step_4.subtitle: Review your trades on interactive charts and add detailed comments. Record your reasoning, emotions, and lessons learned for future reference.

step_5.title: Analyze
step_5.subtitle: Regularly review your trading performance and identify patterns. Learn from mistakes, refine your strategy, and continuously improve your skills.

step_2.title: Link
step_2.subtitle: Securely link your exchange accounts with read-only API keys

advantages.title:
Why Choose
Bull Diary?
advantages.subtitle:
Join thousands of traders who trust Bull Diary for their professional trading needs.
Experience the difference that makes us the preferred choice.

card_1.title: Safe
card_1.subtitle: Your API keys are encrypted and stored with read-only permissions. No trading operations are possible — only data import for analysis.

card_2.title: History
card_2.subtitle: Automatically import and store your entire trading history in one secure location. Access your data anytime, anywhere with full backup protection.

card_3.title: Fast
card_3.subtitle: Automated trade tracking eliminates manual data entry. Focus on strategy instead of spreadsheet management.

card_4.title: Sharing
card_4.subtitle: Create professional trading reports and share insights with your community. Build your reputation as a skilled trader.

card_5.title: Control
card_5.subtitle: Complete ownership of your data with permanent deletion option. Your privacy and control are our top priorities.

precedence.title: Compete & Win
precedence.subtitle: Join exciting trading tournaments and prove your skills against the best traders. Climb the leaderboard, earn recognition, and become a trading champion.

list_1.title: Fair Competition - Equal opportunities for all

list_5.title: Champion Status - Elite status with benefits

question.title: Need Help?
question.subtitle:
Our expert support team is here to help you succeed in your trading journey.

Get instant assistance with platform features, API connections, data synchronization, trading strategies, or any technical issues you might encounter. Whether you're a beginner learning the basics or an experienced trader optimizing your workflow, we're here to guide you every step of the way.

Fill out the form below for personalized support, or contact us directly via email - our dedicated team is available 24/7 to ensure your trading success!

contacts.title:
Get in
Touch
contacts.description:
Need help with your trading platform or have questions about Bull Diary?

  • 24/7 Support: Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you with any questions.
  • Technical Help: Get assistance with platform features, API connections, and data synchronization.
  • Feedback Welcome: Share your suggestions and help us improve the trading experience.
  • Multiple Channels: Contact us via email, social media, or fill out the contact form.

settings.tuning_description:
Customize your trading experience with personalized settings.

  • Language: Switch between Russian and English interfaces.
  • Dark Theme: Enable dark mode for comfortable trading in low-light conditions.
  • Show Markers: Display visual indicators for buy/sell positions in trade tables.
  • Hide Amounts: Conceal financial data for privacy and security.
  • Text Highlighting: Color-code positive and negative values for better readability.
  • Hide Description: Hide page descriptions on mobile devices for easier reading.
  • Sidebar: Manage sidebar visibility - keep it open, closed, or unblocked for easy navigation.
settings.keys_description:
Connect your cryptocurrency exchange accounts to import trading data.

  • Supported Exchanges: Bybit, MEXC, and OKX with futures trading support.
  • API Keys: Securely store your read-only API keys for automatic data synchronization.
  • Data Sync: Import trading history from the last 180 days with real-time progress tracking.
  • Background Processing: Synchronization runs automatically without interrupting your workflow.
  • Multi-Exchange: Connect multiple exchanges simultaneously for comprehensive portfolio analysis.
settings.keys_error_removing:

Welcome back to Bull Diary!

Sign in to access your personalized trading dashboard, view your portfolio performance, analyze your trading history, and participate in exciting tournaments.

Continue your journey toward trading mastery with our professional tools and community.

signin.subtitle_signup:
Join our growing trading community and unlock powerful features!

Create your account to start analyzing your trades with professional tools, save your best transactions to bookmarks, participate in tournaments, and connect with other traders.

Begin your journey toward trading excellence today.

forgot.title: Reset Password

We'll help you get back to your trading dashboard.

Enter the email address you used to register your Bull Diary account,
and we'll send you a secure link to reset your password.

remove_user.title:
Delete
Account
remove_user.admin_error:
User not removed!
Please try again.
remove_user.user_error:
Account not removed!
Please try again.
remove_user.admin_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this user's account?

This action will permanently remove:
• User's trading history and data
• All saved bookmarks and analysis
• Tournament participation and achievements
• Profile information and settings

This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost forever.
remove_user.user_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?

This action will permanently remove:
• Your complete trading history
• All saved bookmarks and analysis
• Tournament participation and achievements
• Profile information and settings

This action cannot be undone and all your data will be lost forever.

confirm.title:
Confirm
Action
confirm.keys_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to delete the API keys for this exchange?

This action will permanently remove your connection to the exchange. You will lose access to:
• Trading history and orders
• Saved bookmarks
• Wallet data and balance information

This action cannot be undone.
confirm.bookmark_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this trade from your bookmarks?

This will permanently delete:
• The saved trade entry
• Any comments or notes you added
• Associated trading analysis

This action cannot be undone.
confirm.tournament_user_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this user from the tournament?

This action will:
• Remove the user from all tournament activities
• Reset their tournament progress and rankings
• Delete their tournament statistics

This action cannot be undone.
confirm.tournament_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to delete this tournament?

This action will permanently delete:
• All tournament data and settings
• Participant rankings and progress
• Tournament statistics and results
• All associated user achievements

This action cannot be undone.
